review:
We have been consulting Dr Lakshmi Devi mam for pregnancy. She identified the issues for non conception and guided us properly.  We  conceived naturally with her guidance and delivered a healthy baby through normal delivery. Through out the journey, mam was very polite, guided us through every step and taken good care. Always a pillar of support.
Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been visiting Dr.Laxmi since day 1 of my pregnancy, what I like most about her is that she gives ample time to listen to problems of her patients, gives suggestions which are very practical and most importantly she has been  a guiding angel for me throughout my pregnancy.
She is always available on call for any queries and problems you may face and has huge amount of patience to listen to her patient giving as much time as possible.
Doctor is very friendly, sweet and extremely soft spoken and kind.
I am going to deliver my first child through her and so far it has been a wonderful experience having her as my primary Gynaec since day 1 of my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently visited dr. Lakshmi through my friend reference. Although I am from far off area  ie marathahalli. but still I visited due to my friend strong recommendation. When I visited dr. After 30 minutes of waiting my turn came. Doctor patiently listen to my all queries. After examining me she suggested scan and she only did. In few minutes I got the report. And she prescribed medicine after few lab test. My problem is  completely solved in few days.
I strongly recommend dr lakshmi for her excellent professional  expertise. And all the treatments available under one roof. Treatment charges also very reasonable compared to many clinics in Whitefield. I was happened see clinic notice board when I was waiting for my turn. Dr has taken 6 gold medals from her university. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very happy with the doctors treatment... she guided me through out the pregnancy... she explained clearly about the diet, physiotherapy during pregnancy.... free diet and physiotherapy classes were also arranged... review: Dr. Lakshmi Devi was very keen in letting the patient know the importance of doing exercises, walking and diet which may help in normal delivery... We are very happy with the Doctor for our delivery.

review: Dr. Lakshmi Devi is one of the best doctors whom I have come across. She is soft spoken and has lots of patience. She explains pros n cons of normal n c-sec delivery. She is available at her clinic on time. She listens completely to the patient. I have started recommending her to my friends n relatives. But would like to suggest one thing. As the clinic is in kadugodi, the traffic is unbearable so if she is available from noon then it'll be easy for carrying women to reach back home early.

review: Dr prescribed for urine culture and we decided to do  in the Dr's clinic itself.  We have been told that it will take 4 days to get the report. review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** *********** ********* ** ***** ******** ** *** ********* ******** ****** ** ********** *** ** **** ************* ** *** ************* ******** **** ***** however, the clinic doesn't give receipts and force us to do blood test and buy medicines from unauthorized pharmacy run by receptionist. In today's world we have plenty of options .if you want to do blood test we can do by sitting in house at discounted /affordable cost from thyrocare or pharmeasy. Even medicines we can buy at 30% discounts. I feel this clinic is good in consultation, hence they can focus on that part bit more rather than trying to sell tests and medicines which is highly expensive.overall I will give 9/10 for Dr laxmidevis service in the infertility treatment. I would recommend this dr to our friends and relatives.
